title: Megan McKenna and Louis Walsh film ahead of X Factor: Celebrity
text:
Megan McKenna and Louis Walsh have been hanging out (Picture: AJMIMAGES.CO.UK)

Megan McKenna was seen welcoming Louis Walsh into her Essex home just days ahead of the launch of The X Factor: Celebrity.

The 27-year-old reality star, who’s set to be competing against the likes of Glee’s Kevin McHale and EastEnders’ Jonny Labey in the series, greeted the infamous telly judge with a big old hug as he arrived on her doorstep.

Looking utterly delighted to see Louis stood outside her front door, Megan smiled from ear to ear and the crew caught the heartwarming moment on tape.

Louis was then photographed getting into Megan’s car before going for a ride around her hometown and the pair looked like they were getting on like a house on fire.

Does this mean that the country singer has made it through to the next round of the hotly-anticipated spin-off? We’re hoping so.

Louis went to visit Megan at her home in Essex (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

Megan was thrilled to see her visitor (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

The pair hugged (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

The X Factor: Celebrity is right around the corner and there’s a whole bunch of famous faces on the star-studded line-up – including Love Island’s Wes Nelson, who’s seriously unimpressed by his group’s name.

Meanwhile, Louis will be joined by Simon Cowell, Nicole Scherzinger on the judging panel, with American Idol’s Howie Mandel and Randy Jackson also paying a visit.

The duo then went for a drive (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

Megan got into the driver’s seat (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

Megan looked chuffed to be in Louis’s company (Picture: RPPIX LTD)

Last week, Louis revealed that Simon told him to get a facelift ahead of the series premiere, admitting: ‘First Simon made me have my eye bags done.

‘I went to Sharon’s [Osbourne] man for that – and she knows all the best surgeons. Then Simon got on about my hair.

‘So I went to a lovely fellow who took some hair off the back of my head and put it on the top. So it’s actually your own hair just put back in the right place.’

He added to Mail Online: ‘And then there’s the teeth. I’ve had my teeth whitened, but everybody does that now. And that’s it.’

The X Factor: Celebrity kicks off Saturday at 8.35pm on ITV.
